name: Charles M. WATKINS, Appellant v. ASSOCIATION OF PENNSYLVANIA STATE COLLEGE AND UNIVERSITY FACULTIES, and the State System of Higher Education, Appellees
name_abbreviation: Watkins v. Association of Pennsylvania State College & University Faculties

parties: Charles M. WATKINS, Appellant v. ASSOCIATION OF PENNSYLVANIA STATE COLLEGE AND UNIVERSITY FACULTIES, and the State System of Higher Education, Appellees.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 22nd day of September, 2004, the Order of the Commonwealth Court is hereby AFFIRMED.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

casebody.head_matter:
858 A.2d 1162
Charles M. WATKINS, Appellant v. ASSOCIATION OF PENNSYLVANIA STATE COLLEGE AND UNIVERSITY FACULTIES, and the State System of Higher Education, Appellees.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Sept. 22, 2004.
